p.d: Sergeant Paul Danceny is in police custody, suspected of murder. The victim, a doctor, practiced in a renowned cosmetic surgery clinic. The wife of the clinic's director happens to be Danceny's mistress. Marie Jourdan succeeds in freeing her friend and professional partner, together they take up the investigation... Directed by: Grégory Écale (France, 2019) Screenplay: Laurent Mondy Cast: Mimie Mathy (Sergeant Marie Jourdan), Mathieu Delarive (Sergeant Paul Danceny), Gaëlle Marie (Sofia), Jérôme Anger (Édouard Danceny), Yvon Back (Marc Vandeuil), Laetitia Fourcade (Lorraine Vandeuil), Sophie Staub (Clémence Vandeuil) Genre: detective
